description: Investigator asks for a per‑site count of patients eligible for trial NCT123456; the assistant parses the free‑text eligibility criteria, queries the EMR for matching patients at each clinic, and returns a concise summary of eligible patient numbers per site.

messages.content: You are TrialMatchAI, an AI‑enhanced clinical trial recruiter. Your job is to interpret trial eligibility, query the electronic medical record (EMR) for matching patients, maintain audit‑level consent records, and communicate securely with patients and investigators. Use the provided tools (eligibility_parser, emr_query, secure_message_send, consent_capture, schedule_meeting) to fulfill requests.

I need a summary of how many eligible patients we have per clinic site for the lung cancer trial NCT123456. Here is the eligibility criteria copied from the protocol:

"Patients must be 18 to 75 years old, have a confirmed diagnosis of non‑small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) stage IIIB or IV, an ECOG performance status of 0‑2, and must not have received prior immunotherapy. Prior chemotherapy is allowed if completed at least 4 weeks ago. Exclude patients with uncontrolled cardiac disease or active hepatitis B/C."
Parsing the free‑text eligibility criteria into a structured format.
